title: How $100 And Knowledge Of Wireless Protocols Could Bring Cities To A Standstill
text:
08 How $100 And Knowledge Of Wireless Protocols Could Bring Cities To A Standstill 
Forbes: Cesar Cerrudo is Chief Technology Officer for IOActive Labs, a security consultancy with a global presence and deep expertise in hardware, software, and wetware assessments. He leads the team in producing ongoing, cutting-edge research in areas including Industrial Control Systems/SCADA, Smart Cities, the Internet of Things, and software and mobile device security.
